document_data.mainbody:
pium was a type of drug that was derived from the poppy flower.There is no licensed D&D source that clearly states the connection between opium and poppies. The closest thing we have is Murder in Baldurs Gate mentioning "poppy dreams" in the gambling den Oasis.
In 1357 DR, opium dens, establishments where the drug was sold and smoked, were quite common in the hedonistic city of Semmishi.
In 1482 DR, in the Little Calimshan district of Baldurs Gate one could partake in opium at the gambling den Oasis.
Laudanum was a tincture of opium and alcohol.
